intent_atoms.description: Display each chunk offset as decimal plus hexadecimal in the stco/co64 Chunk Offset Parser.
The parser must preserve width for stco (32-bit) and co64 (64-bit) entries when showing dual-format values.
Unit tests (StcoChunkOffsetParserTests) must assert the new formatting for 32-bit, 64-bit, and truncated tables.
JSON snapshot fixtures must include the dual-format chunk offset values as baseline exports.
Implement validation rule #15 to correlate chunk offsets with stsc chunk runs and stsz/stz2 sample sizes.

functional_units.name: Chunk Offset Parser
functional_units.description: Parses stco and co64 chunks to display each offset in decimal and hexadecimal format while preserving field width

functional_units.name: Unit Tests for Chunk Offset Parser
functional_units.description: Provides comprehensive test coverage for 32-bit, 64-bit, and truncated tables of the parser

functional_units.name: JSON Snapshot Fixtures Refresh
functional_units.description: Updates JSON snapshots to include dual-format chunk offset values for baseline exports
